title: Personalized Language Proficiency Enhancement Program in Adaptive Web Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate or advanced expertise in the relevant language field
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning environments for improving job-linked language proficiency among professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify personalized learning paths reflecting their emotional states and learning intentions with over 80% accuracy
Learners can improve practical language proficiency in target domains by over 30% within six months using adaptive system feedback
Learners achieve over 85% participation rates in learning modules incorporating social interaction elements (discussion boards, collaborative tasks)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
